Articles.Content:
I love planes, in particular fighters like F-22's, 16's, and 15's. Also i like SSTO's. So i decided to combine the 2! The only problem is that i am crap at replicating and at making SSTO's.

So i would be very grateful if some1 could make 1 for me.

Please? I wont kill tooo many kerbals in it
I may be able to help, if I can find my old SSTOs. Unfortunately, all my fighters carry kerbombs, so it's hard to fly them effectively without killing a lot of Kerbals.

Are you using FAR or stock aerodynamics?

It's far easier to make a plane that resembles the 4th-5th generation trapezoidal or swept wing planforms when using FAR. Stock aerodynamics tends to favour the delta wing planform and you also need a lot more wing area, thus making it difficult to achieve any other wing configuration.
